Posts.EditableText:
hi.

Is it possible to make a swedish language translation with the characters å ä ö working?

I remember seeing a danish translation.

Anyone?
Thanx.
Posts.HTML:
hi.

Is it possible to make a swedish language translation with the characters å ä ö working?

I remember seeing a danish translation.

Anyone?
Thanx.

Posts.EditableText: There is a Russian translation, so should be no problem.  I think object names need to be in plain Latin, but you can set the alias to what the player will see.
Posts.HTML: There is a Russian translation, so should be no problem. I think object names need to be in plain Latin, but you can set the alias to what the player will see.
